fullName: Registration Page: Verify that user receives error message for empty Password and Password confirmation fields during registration

name: Verify that user receives error message for empty Password and Password confirmation fields during registration

steps.name: Given  The user is on the new user registration page
When  The user clicks Register button after entering Username with other fields empty from sheetname "Register" and row 1
Then  The error message Please fill out this field. appears below Password textbox
